nodes.bodyText: Is my understanding correct this number is never used and the real width is always set dynamically via ConversionMessageWidget constructor?
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: So this was never used, I removed it.

nodes.bodyText: Are we sure WidthCalculator from ConversionMessageWidget doesn't return bigger number?
This sets the main popup box width.
